backend/main.mo: Defines a simple backend actor exposing healthCheck and version query functions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for various frontend source files used in build planning.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base setup with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes using OKLCH colors.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root component rendering header, theme toggle, crypto dashboard, and backend health logging.
frontend/src/components/ThemeToggle.tsx: Button component that switches between light and dark mode using the useTheme hook.
frontend/src/features/crypto/CryptoDashb: Displays crypto market data in a table with loading, error handling, and 5-second refresh indicators.
frontend/src/features/crypto/types.ts: Type definitions for CryptoAsset and API response structures.
frontend/src/features/crypto/useCryptoMa: React Query hook fetching top 50 assets from CoinCap, converting values to EUR, and mapping to CryptoAsset.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to user identity, invalidating dependent queries when updated.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication context using Internet Identity, handling login, identity persistence, and state management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for backend health and version calls using the actor instance.
frontend/src/hooks/useTheme.ts: React hook managing light/dark theme, syncing it to localStorage and toggling a root CSS class.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styling plus OKLCH CSS variables defining light and dark theme color tokens.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Entry point creating the React root, initializing React Query, and rendering App within providers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors from CSS variables and enabling plugins and dark mode.
project_state.json: Metadata describing the project state, features, issues, and architectural notes for the crypto tracker app.
